originalText.text:
Tricia is an amazingly gifted coach who has a unique ability to transform even a sliver of an idea into a message worthy of a TED stage. She able to work magic - it's a beautiful thing to experience. I was lucky to get to work alongside Tricia in binging my Oxford Talk to life.

If you believe you have a story to share or a message you are ready to amplify to the world, I highly recommend working with Tricia.

originalText.text:
Tricia Brouk graced the stage at our live event, and she was a force to be reckoned with. She commanded the attention of the audience and brought her brilliance in a way only a truly gifted and trained performer can. Her take on speaking, creating your own big talk and having an impact is something every audience needs to hear.

As a business owner, and founder of The Big Talk, her work ethic and dedication to her students unparalleled. Her programs are top-notch and there is no one better to learn from and be mentored by in the world of speaking than Tricia.

She commanded the attention of the audience and brought her brilliance in a way only a truly gifted and trained performer can. Her take on speaking, creating your own big talk and having an impact is something every audience needs to hear.

As a business owner, and founder of The Big Talk, her work ethic and dedication to her students unparalleled. Her programs are top-notch and there is no one better to learn from and be mentored by in the world of speaking than Tricia.

originalText.text: My experience working with Tricia has been top notch ever since I was first introduced to her in 2021.  I took part in the fall of 21' Speaker Salon in NYC.  Having Tricia's direction and feedback in real time was invaluable.  Due to her years of speaking herself and now mentoring other thought leaders, the insights she had into my performance were amazing.  I continue to use many of those strategies to this day.  I have also been working 1 on 1 with Tricia throughout 2022.  When she offered it to me during the Speaker Salon I had no idea what, "building out a speaker platform" meant let alone if I wanted that.  What we've accomplished in a little over 6 months has been mind blowing and I can only look forward to the future.  I would highly recommend Tricia to any thought leader that is looking to take their life (yes life, not business) to the next level.

originalText.text:
Working and training with Tricia Brouk has been by far one of the best decisions of my life.

Not only did I have a presentation that landed me on a TEDx stage, but more importantly my confidence as a Speaker and Expert skyrocketed.

She has an innate ability to help people tap into areas of themselves and articulate their stories in an effortless, profound, and powerful way. After taking multiple courses and workshops to enhance my speaking capability, I can say without a doubt that Tricia’s unique method is the best in the business.

Besides my personal transformation as a speaker with her, I’ve had the honor of witnessing the transformation of other speakers as well. I can sincerely say there are no words that can fully describe what being guided, directed, and supported by Tricia is like, other than to experience it for yourself.

originalText.text: If you are pulled to a greater purpose to use your voice and experience so that you can help other deserving humans learn, grow or connect - THIS IS THE PLACE TO BE. Tricia Brouk is incredibly skilled at supporting you to amplify your message to the audience that needs to hear you most. If you want a professional driven by integrity, kindness and inclusion, look no further, you have found her.
